name: Elmar Barthen

personality.mannerisms: Adjusts spectacles, keeps meticulous ledgers, always fair in deals

role: Owner of largest trading post in Phandalin. Gundren's friend.
quest_payment: If party delivers wagon (Meet Me in Phandalin hook), pays 10 gp per character

information.gundren: Friend and customer. Expected days ago. Worried if party says he's captured.
information.brothers: Nundro and Tharden camped outside town. Haven't seen them in tenday. Due back 'any day now' to resupply.
information.redbrands: Making life hard on everyone. Shaking down businesses. Advises party to avoid Sleeping Giant tavern.

inventory: Most adventuring gear under 25 gp. No weapons/armor (see Lionshield Coster)
